title: Television production fundamentals: blended collaborative learning course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Video Production Theory and Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Blended course for current practitioners emphasizing active and collaborative learning, with project-based assessment utilizing personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively produce a 5-minute short video proposal in team-based production groups.
Learners can create a 2-minute sample video using real-time editing software and incorporate peer feedback.
An integrated assessment rubric combining technical and artistic elements of television production can be developed and applied to project deliverables.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
